name: freepikcompany/telephponic
description: A comprehensive PHP telemetry library enabling efficient collection, analysis, and visualization of your application's performance metrics. Make informed decisions with Telephphonic!

suggest.ext-protobuf: Significant performance improvement for otlp+protobuf exporting
suggest.ext-mbstring: More performant than the fallback, symfony/polyfill-mbstring
suggest.ext-zlib: If you want to compress exported data
suggest.ext-curl: If you want to profile curl
suggest.ext-memcached: If you want to profile memcached
suggest.ext-pdo: If you want to profile PDO
suggest.ext-redis: If you want to profile redis
